entry.title: Get together drinks @ Trespassers
entry.content: Bye bye meetup.com drinks Let's meetup for some casual food and drinks, and bid farewell to Meetup.com, another victim of private equity. Date: 12th February Location: Trespassers Please RSVP on Luma to stay updated.

entry.title: Clojure Meetup - July 2025
entry.content: Clojure Meetup - July 2025 Join us for our summer Clojure meetup in Berlin! We are going to have a short intro on clojure-mcp and how you can use it with existing tools. Afterwards, we are going to split into groups and do a Learning Dojo to experiment with it. Please RSVP on Luma to stay updated.

entry.title: Bits & Beers: Clojure Berlin meets Elixir Berlin
entry.content: Pre Bobkonf get together with Elixir Berlin Join us for friendly beers at Volksbar in Mitte on Thursday! We're organizing this event together with our fellow Functional Programming aficionados from Elixir Berlin. But wait, there's more: this event also doubles as pre-conference drinks for Bobkonf 2025, which is happening this weekend. If you don't have a ticket yet, use discount code CLOJURE-ELIXIR-MEETUP-BONUS for 12.5% off.

entry.title: Get together drinks @ Trespassers
entry.content: Clojure Berlin Pre Holidays get together drinks People left in Berlin - let's meetup and get together before the year is out! Date: 19th December Location: Trespassers Please RSVP here!
